00041 CompareQM::CompareQM( QualityMetric* primary, QualityMetric* other, 
00042                       const char* primary_name, const char* other_name )
00043   : primaryMetric( primary ), 
00044     otherMetric( other ),
00045     abortOnMismatch( false ),
00046     toleranceFactor( 1e-6 )
00047 {
00048   if (primary_name)
00049     primaryName = primary_name;
00050   if (other_name)
00051     otherName = other_name;
00052 }
00053 
00054 CompareQM::~CompareQM()
00055 {}
00056 
00057 void CompareQM::abort_on_mismatch( double tolerance ) 
00058 {
00059   abortOnMismatch = true;
00060   toleranceFactor = tolerance;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void CompareQM::do_not_abort()
00064 { 
00065   abortOnMismatch = false;
00066 }
00067 
00068 bool CompareQM::will_abort_on_mismatch() const
00069 {
00070   return abortOnMismatch;
00071 }
00072 
00073 QualityMetric::MetricType CompareQM::get_metric_type() const 
00074 {
00075   MetricType type1, type2;
00076   type1 = primaryMetric->get_metric_type();
00077   type2 = otherMetric->get_metric_type();
00078   if (type1 != type2) {
00079     std::cerr << "Incompatible metric types in CompareQM" << std::endl
00080               << __FILE__ << ':' << __LINE__ << std::endl;
00081     if (abortOnMismatch)
00082       abort();
00083     // otherwise just return some type because this function can't
00084     // flag an error.  The mismatch should cause get_evaluations
00085     // to fail anyway.
00086   }
00087   return type1;  
00088 }
00089 
00090 std::string CompareQM::get_name() const 
00091 {
00092   return primaryMetric->get_name();
00093 }
00094 
00095 int CompareQM::get_negate_flag() const 
00096 {
00097   return primaryMetric->get_negate_flag();
00098 }

00100 void CompareQM::get_evaluations( PatchData& pd,
00101                                  std::vector<size_t>& handles,
00102                                  bool free_only,
00103                                  MsqError& err )
00104 {
00105   primaryMetric->get_evaluations( pd, handles, free_only, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00106   
00107   std::vector<size_t> handles2;
00108   otherMetric->get_evaluations( pd, handles2, free_only, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00109   
00110   std::vector<size_t> handles1( handles );
00111   std::sort( handles1.begin(), handles1.end() );
00112   std::sort( handles2.begin(), handles2.end() );
00113   if (handles1 != handles2) {
00114     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Incompatible metrics cannot be compared", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00115   }
00116 }
00117 
00118 bool CompareQM::check_valid( size_t handle, bool rval1, bool rval2 ) 
00119 {
00120   if (rval1 != rval2) {
00121     std::cerr << "Metrics returned conflicting validity at location " << std::hex << handle << std::dec
00122               << std::endl << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << std::endl;
00123     if (abortOnMismatch) 
00124       abort();
00125     else
00126       return false;
00127   }
00128   
00129   return rval1;
00130 }
00131 
00132 double CompareQM::epsilon( double a, double b )
00133 { 
00134   return toleranceFactor * std::max( 1.0, std::max( a, b ) );
00135 }
00136 
00137 void CompareQM::check_value( size_t handle, double value, double value2 )
00138 {
00139   valPrimary.add_value( value );
00140   valOther.add_value( value2 );
00141   valDiff.add_value( fabs(value - value2) );
00142   
00143   if (abortOnMismatch) {
00144     if (fabs(value - value2) > epsilon(value, value2)) {
00145       std::cerr << "Metric values to not match at location " << std::hex << handle << std::dec << std::endl
00146                 << "Primary: " << value << std::endl
00147                 << "Other  : " << value2 << std::endl
00148                 << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << std::endl;
00149       abort();
00150     }
00151   }
00152 }
00153 
00154 bool CompareQM::evaluate( PatchData& pd, size_t handle, double& value, MsqError& err )
00155 {
00156   double value2;
00157   bool rval1, rval2;
00158   rval1 = primaryMetric->evaluate( pd, handle, value, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00159   rval2 = otherMetric->evaluate( pd, handle, value2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00160   if (!check_valid( handle, rval1, rval2 ))
00161     return false;
00162   
00163   check_value( handle, value, value2 );
00164   return true;
00165 }
00166 
00167 void CompareQM::index_mismatch( size_t handle,
00168                                 const std::vector<size_t>& idx1,
00169                                 const std::vector<size_t>& idx2,
00170                                 MsqError& err )
00171 {
00172   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00173 
00174   std::cerr << "Metrics cannot be compared at location " << std::hex << handle << std::dec << 
00175                   " because they are incompatible." << std::endl
00176                   << "Primary metric vertices: ";
00177   if (idx1.empty())
00178     std::cerr << "(empty)";
00179   else {
00180     i = idx1.begin();
00181     std::cerr << *i;
00182     for (++i; i != idx1.end(); ++i) 
00183       std::cerr << ',' << *i;
00184   }
00185   std::cerr << std::endl << "Other metric vertices: " ;
00186   if (idx2.empty())
00187     std::cerr << "(empty)";
00188   else {
00189     i = idx2.begin();
00190     std::cerr << *i;
00191     for (++i; i != idx2.end(); ++i) 
00192       std::cerr << ',' << *i;
00193   }
00194   std::cerr << std::endl;
00195 
00196   if (abortOnMismatch)
00197     abort();
00198   MSQ_SETERR(err)("Cannot compare incompatible metrics", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00199 }
00200                                
00201 
00202 void CompareQM::check_indices( size_t handle,
00203                                const std::vector<size_t>& idx1,
00204                                const std::vector<size_t>& idx2,
00205                                std::vector<size_t>& map_out,
00206                                MsqError& err )
00207 {
00208   if (idx1.size() != idx2.size()) {
00209     index_mismatch( handle, idx1, idx2, err );
00210     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00211   }
00212   
00213   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i, j;
00214   map_out.clear();
00215   for (i = idx1.begin(); i != idx1.end(); ++i) {
00216     j = std::find( idx2.begin(), idx2.end(), *i );
00217     if (j == idx2.end()) {
00218       index_mismatch( handle, idx1, idx2, err );
00219       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00220     }
00221     map_out.push_back( j - idx2.begin() );
00222   }
00223 }
00224 
00225 bool CompareQM::evaluate_with_indices( PatchData& pd,
00226                                        size_t handle,
00227                                        double& value,
00228                                        std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00229                                        MsqError& err )
00230 {
00231   bool valid1, valid2;
00232   double value2;
00233   std::vector<size_t> indices2, junk;
00234   valid1 = primaryMetric->evaluate_with_indices( pd, handle, value, indices, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00235   valid2 = otherMetric->evaluate_with_indices( pd, handle, value2, indices2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00236   if (!check_valid( handle, valid1, valid2 ))
00237     return false;
00238   
00239   check_value( handle, value, value2 );
00240   check_indices( handle, indices, indices2, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00241   return true;
00242 }
00243 
00244 void CompareQM::check_grad( size_t handle,
00245                             const std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00246                             const std::vector<size_t>& index_map,
00247                             const std::vector<Vector3D>& grad1,
00248                             const std::vector<Vector3D>& grad2 )
00249 {
00250   assert(index_map.size() == indices.size());
00251   assert(index_map.size() == grad1.size());
00252   assert(index_map.size() == grad2.size());
00253   for (size_t i = 0; i < index_map.size(); ++i) {
00254     gradPrimary.add( grad1[i] );
00255     gradOther.add( grad2[i] );
00256     gradDiff.add_diff( grad1[i], grad2[index_map[i]] );
00257     
00258     if (abortOnMismatch) {
00259       if ((grad1[i] - grad2[index_map[i]]).length() > epsilon(grad1[i].length(), grad2[index_map[i]].length()) ) {
00260         std::cerr << "Gradients differ for metric evaluation at " << std::hex << handle << std::dec << std::endl
00261                   << "Primary metric derivs with respect to vertex " << indices[i] << ": " << grad1[i] << std::endl
00262                   << "Other metric derivs with presect to vertex " << indices[i] << ": " << grad2[index_map[i]] << std::endl
00263                   << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << std::endl;
00264         abort();
00265       }
00266     }
00267   }
00268 }
00269 
00270 bool CompareQM::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00271                                         size_t handle,
00272                                         double& value,
00273                                         std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00274                                         std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00275                                         MsqError& err )
00276 {
00277   bool valid1, valid2;
00278   double value2;
00279   std::vector<size_t> indices2, map;
00280   std::vector<Vector3D> grad2;
00281   valid1 = primaryMetric->evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, value, indices, grad, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00282   valid2 = otherMetric->evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, value2, indices2, grad2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00283   if (!check_valid( handle, valid1, valid2 ))
00284     return false;
00285   
00286   check_value( handle, value, value2 );
00287   check_indices( handle, indices, indices2, map, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00288   check_grad( handle, indices, map, grad, grad2 );
00289   return true;
00290 }
00291 
00292 void CompareQM::check_hess_diag( size_t handle,
00293                                  const std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00294                                  const std::vector<size_t>& index_map,
00295                                  const std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& hess1,
00296                                  const std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& hess2 )
00297 {
00298   assert(index_map.size() == indices.size());
00299   assert(index_map.size() == hess1.size());
00300   assert(index_map.size() == hess2.size());
00301   for (size_t i = 0; i < index_map.size(); ++i) {
00302     hessPrimary.add_diag( hess1[i] );
00303     hessOther.add_diag( hess2[i] );
00304     hessDiff.add_diag_diff( hess1[i], hess2[index_map[i]] );
00305     
00306     if (abortOnMismatch) {
00307       double eps = epsilon( Frobenius(hess1[i]), Frobenius(hess2[index_map[i]]) );
00308       if (Frobenius(hess1[i] - hess2[index_map[i]]) > eps) {
00309         std::cerr << "Hessian diagonal blocks differ for metric evaluation at " << std::hex << handle << std::dec << std::endl
00310                   << "For second derivatives with repsect to vertex " << indices[i] << "twice" << std::endl
00311                   << "Primary metric derivs: " << hess1[i] << std::endl
00312                   << "Other metric derivs: " << hess2[index_map[i]] << std::endl
00313                   << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << std::endl;
00314         abort();
00315       }
00316     }
00317   }
00318 }
00319 
00320 bool CompareQM::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( PatchData& pd,
00321                                         size_t handle,
00322                                         double& value,
00323                                         std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00324                                         std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00325                                         std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& hess,
00326                                         MsqError& err )
00327 {
00328   bool valid1, valid2;
00329   double value2;
00330   std::vector<size_t> indices2, map;
00331   std::vector<Vector3D> grad2;
00332   std::vector<SymMatrix3D> hess2;
00333   valid1 = primaryMetric->evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( pd, handle, value, indices, grad, hess, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00334   valid2 = otherMetric->evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( pd, handle, value2, indices2, grad2, hess2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00335   if (!check_valid( handle, valid1, valid2 ))
00336     return false;
00337   
00338   check_value( handle, value, value2 );
00339   check_indices( handle, indices, indices2, map, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00340   check_grad( handle, indices, map, grad, grad2 );
00341   check_hess_diag( handle, indices, map, hess, hess2 );
00342   return true;
00343 }
00344 
00345 void CompareQM::check_hess( size_t handle,
00346                             const std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00347                             const std::vector<size_t>& index_map,
00348                             const std::vector<Matrix3D>& hess1,
00349                             const std::vector<Matrix3D>& hess2 )
00350 {
00351   const size_t n = index_map.size();
00352   const size_t N = (n + 1) * n / 2;
00353   assert(n == indices.size());
00354   assert(N == hess1.size());
00355   assert(N == hess2.size());
00356   
00357   for (size_t r = 0; r < n; ++r) {
00358     const size_t r2 = index_map[r];
00359     for (size_t c = r; c < n; ++c) {
00360       const size_t c2 = index_map[c];
00361       size_t idx1 = n*r - r*(r+1)/2 + c;
00362       Matrix3D h2;
00363       if (r2 <= c2) {
00364         size_t idx2 = n*r2 - r2*(r2+1)/2 + c2;
00365         h2 = hess2[idx2];
00366       }
00367       else {
00368         size_t idx2 = n*c2 - c2*(c2+1)/2 + r2;
00369         h2 = transpose(hess2[idx2]);
00370       }
00371       
00372       if (r == c) {
00373         hessPrimary.add_diag( hess1[idx1] );
00374         hessOther.add_diag( h2 );
00375         hessDiff.add_diag_diff( hess1[idx1], h2 );
00376       }
00377       else {
00378         hessPrimary.add_nondiag( hess1[idx1] );
00379         hessOther.add_nondiag( h2 );
00380         hessDiff.add_nondiag_diff( hess1[idx1], h2 );
00381       }
00382       
00383       if (abortOnMismatch) {
00384         double eps = epsilon( sqrt(Frobenius_2(hess1[idx1])), sqrt(Frobenius_2(h2)) );
00385         if (sqrt(Frobenius_2(hess1[idx1] - h2)) > eps) {
00386           std::cerr << "Hessian blocks differ for metric evaluation at " << std::hex << handle << std::dec << std::endl
00387                     << "For second derivatives with repsect to vertices " << indices[r] << " and " << indices[c] << std::endl
00388                     << "Primary metric derivs: " << hess1[idx1] << std::endl
00389                     << "Other metric derivs: " << h2 << std::endl
00390                     << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << std::endl;
00391           abort();
00392         }
00393       }
00394     }
00395   }
00396 }
00397 
00398 bool CompareQM::evaluate_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd,
00399                                        size_t handle,
00400                                        double& value,
00401                                        std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00402                                        std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00403                                        std::vector<Matrix3D>& hess,
00404                                        MsqError& err )
00405 {
00406   bool valid1, valid2;
00407   double value2;
00408   std::vector<size_t> indices2, map;
00409   std::vector<Vector3D> grad2;
00410   std::vector<Matrix3D> hess2;
00411   valid1 = primaryMetric->evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle, value, indices, grad, hess, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00412   valid2 = otherMetric->evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle, value2, indices2, grad2, hess2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00413   if (!check_valid( handle, valid1, valid2 ))
00414     return false;
00415   
00416   check_value( handle, value, value2 );
00417   check_indices( handle, indices, indices2, map, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00418   check_grad( handle, indices, map, grad, grad2 );
00419   check_hess( handle, indices, map, hess, hess2 );
00420   return true;
00421 }
00422 
00423 void CompareQM::GradStat::add( Vector3D grad ) 
00424 {
00425   x.add_value(grad[0]);
00426   y.add_value(grad[1]);
00427   z.add_value(grad[2]);
00428 }
00429 
00430 void CompareQM::GradStat::add_diff( Vector3D grad1, Vector3D grad2 ) 
00431 {
00432   x.add_value(fabs(grad1[0]-grad2[0]));
00433   y.add_value(fabs(grad1[1]-grad2[1]));
00434   z.add_value(fabs(grad1[2]-grad2[2]));
00435 }
00436 
00437 void CompareQM::HessStat::add_diag( Matrix3D hess ) 
00438 {
00439   xx.add_value(  hess[0][0] );
00440   xy.add_value( (hess[0][1]+hess[1][0])/2 );
00441   xz.add_value( (hess[0][2]+hess[2][0])/2 );
00442   yy.add_value(  hess[1][1] );
00443   yz.add_value( (hess[1][2]+hess[2][1])/2 );
00444   zz.add_value(  hess[2][2] );
00445 }
00446 
00447 void CompareQM::HessStat::add_diag( SymMatrix3D hess ) 
00448 {
00449   xx.add_value( hess[0] );
00450   xy.add_value( hess[1] );
00451   xz.add_value( hess[2] );
00452   yy.add_value( hess[3] );
00453   yz.add_value( hess[4] );
00454   zz.add_value( hess[5] );
00455 }
00456 
00457 void CompareQM::HessStat::add_diag_diff( Matrix3D hess1, Matrix3D hess2 ) 
00458 {
00459   Matrix3D d = hess1 - hess2;
00460   Matrix3D hess( fabs(d[0][0]), fabs(d[0][1]), fabs(d[0][2]),
00461                  fabs(d[1][0]), fabs(d[1][1]), fabs(d[1][2]),
00462                  fabs(d[2][0]), fabs(d[2][1]), fabs(d[2][2]) );
00463   add_diag( hess );
00464 }
00465 
00466 void CompareQM::HessStat::add_diag_diff( SymMatrix3D hess1, SymMatrix3D hess2 ) 
00467 {
00468   SymMatrix3D d = hess1 - hess2;
00469   SymMatrix3D hess( fabs(d[0]), fabs(d[1]), fabs(d[2]),
00470                                 fabs(d[3]), fabs(d[4]),
00471                                             fabs(d[5]) );
00472   add_diag( hess );
00473 }
00474 
00475 void CompareQM::HessStat::add_nondiag( Matrix3D hess ) 
00476 {
00477   xx.add_value( hess[0][0] );
00478   xy.add_value( hess[0][1] );
00479   xy.add_value( hess[1][0] );
00480   xz.add_value( hess[0][2] );
00481   xz.add_value( hess[2][0] );
00482   yy.add_value( hess[1][1] );
00483   yz.add_value( hess[1][2] );
00484   yz.add_value( hess[2][1] );
00485   zz.add_value( hess[2][2] );
00486 }
00487 
00488 void CompareQM::HessStat::add_nondiag_diff( Matrix3D hess1, Matrix3D hess2 ) 
00489 {
00490   Matrix3D d = hess1 - hess2;
00491   Matrix3D hess( fabs(d[0][0]), fabs(d[0][1]), fabs(d[0][2]),
00492                  fabs(d[1][0]), fabs(d[1][1]), fabs(d[1][2]),
00493                  fabs(d[2][0]), fabs(d[2][1]), fabs(d[2][2]) );
00494   add_nondiag( hess );
00495 }
00496 
00497 static void print( const char* title,
00498                    const char* name1,
00499                    const char* name2,
00500                    const SimpleStats& s1,
00501                    const SimpleStats& s2,
00502                    const SimpleStats& sd )
00503 {
00504   const char named[] = "difference";
00505   int len = std::max( std::max( strlen(named), strlen(title) ), std::max( strlen(name1), strlen(name2) ) );
00506   std::vector<char> dashes(len, '-');
00507   dashes.push_back('\0');
00508   printf( "%*s %12s %12s %12s %12s %12s\n", len, title, 
00509      "minimum", "average", "rms", "maximum", "std.dev." );
00510   printf( "%s ------------ ------------ ------------ ------------ ------------\n", &dashes[0] );
00511   printf( "%*s % 12g % 12g % 12g % 12g % 12g\n", len, name1, 
00512                                      s1.minimum(),
00513                                      s1.average(),
00514                                      s1.rms(),
00515                                      s1.maximum(),
00516                                      s1.standard_deviation() );
00517   printf( "%*s % 12g % 12g % 12g % 12g % 12g\n", len, name2, 
00518                                      s2.minimum(),
00519                                      s2.average(),
00520                                      s2.rms(),
00521                                      s2.maximum(),
00522                                      s2.standard_deviation() );
00523   printf( "%*s % 12g % 12g % 12g % 12g % 12g\n", len, named, 
00524                                      sd.minimum(),
00525                                      sd.average(),
00526                                      sd.rms(),
00527                                      sd.maximum(),
00528                                      sd.standard_deviation() );
00529   printf("\n");
00530 }
00531 
00532 void CompareQM::print_stats() const
00533 {
00534   std::string name1 = primaryName.empty() ? primaryMetric->get_name() : primaryName;
00535   std::string name2 =   otherName.empty() ?   otherMetric->get_name() :   otherName;
00536   print( "Values", name1.c_str(), name2.c_str(), valPrimary, valOther, valDiff );
00537   print( "Gradient X", name1.c_str(), name2.c_str(), gradPrimary.x, gradOther.x, gradDiff.x );
00538   print( "Gradient Y", name1.c_str(), name2.c_str(), gradPrimary.y, gradOther.y, gradDiff.y );
00539   print( "Gradient Z", name1.c_str(), name2.c_str(), gradPrimary.z, gradOther.z, gradDiff.z );
00540   print( "Hessian XX", name1.c_str(), name2.c_str(), hessPrimary.xx, hessOther.xx, hessDiff.xx );
00541   print( "Hessian XY", name1.c_str(), name2.c_str(), hessPrimary.xy, hessOther.xy, hessDiff.xy );
00542   print( "Hessian XZ", name1.c_str(), name2.c_str(), hessPrimary.xz, hessOther.xz, hessDiff.xz );
00543   print( "Hessian YY", name1.c_str(), name2.c_str(), hessPrimary.yy, hessOther.yy, hessDiff.yy );
00544   print( "Hessian YZ", name1.c_str(), name2.c_str(), hessPrimary.yz, hessOther.yz, hessDiff.yz );
00545   print( "Hessian ZZ", name1.c_str(), name2.c_str(), hessPrimary.zz, hessOther.zz, hessDiff.zz );
00546 }
